title: The declarations as vvell of the French King, as of the King of Nauarre Concerning the truce agreed vpon betwene their Maiesties: and touching the passage of the riuer of Loire.
author: France. Sovereign (1574-1589 : Henry III)
publisher: Printed by Richard Field, dwelling in the black-Friers, neere Ludgate,
notes: Henry III's declaration dated "Saulmur this 24. of April .. 1589"; Henry IV's "Saulmur, the eighteenth of Aprill, 1589".
Identified as STC 13095 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
